This form element allows the user to sel: This form element allows the user to select their ticket(s). It cannot be removed but can be placed anywhere in the RSVP form.
This form element asks the user a simple: This form element asks the user a simple math question in order to prevent spam.
This form element only appears if there: This form element only appears if there there are multiple gateways enabled. It cannot be removed but can be placed anywhere in the RSVP form.
